definitions.definition: To compose (a document), especially following a standard form.
definitions.example: I asked my lawyer to draw up a new will.

definitions.definition: To arrange in order or formation.
definitions.example: Sergeant, please draw the men up in ranks of three.

definitions.definition: To cause to come to a halt.
definitions.example: Draw up the carriage just around the corner!
The tractor drew up alongside the haystack.
